*Quick Demo :*

To see a quick demo of the library, you have two possible ways :
 # Downloading the source code then deploy the (gmaps4jsf-examples.war) file.
 # Or Downloading the latest (gmaps4jsf-examples.war) file from the (Downloads) section.
 Then type :
 http://localhost:8080/gmaps4jsf-examples/ (If you are using port 8080 in your Tomcat :)).
